news & events

  • FameLab Egypt Winner Chosen
    29/03/2011
    Mahmoud Abu Khedr, a third-year mechanical engineering student at the University of Alexandria. has won this years final of FameLab Egypt.
  • 2011 International FameLab Final
    18/03/2011
    The 2011 International Final of FameLab will be held at The Times Cheltenham science Festival on Saturday June 11.
